name: THE CON JOB
description:
you're at a convention in the Perfect Costume but when a completely non-canonical stain shows up everything is about to be ruined!!!!!!!!!! navigate a weebish minefield to get that Razzle Dazzle back!!!

a small gift both about and for my good buddy morgan <3 sry everything i make is moody and sad, heres something different

cranked out in abt 2hrs, one ending and some minor customization, have fun!!
